data.title: Slavia Praha live score, schedule & player stats
data.meta_description: Slavia Praha live score, fixtures, player ratings and statistics.
data.text:
Slavia Praha live scores, players, season schedule and today’s results are available on Sofascore.

Slavia Praha next match

Slavia Praha will play the next match against Lille on Aug 28, 2024, 7:00:00 PM UTC in UEFA Champions League.

When the match starts, you will be able to follow Slavia Praha vs Lille live score, standings, minute by minute updated live results and match statistics.

We may have video highlights with goals and news for some Slavia Praha matches, but only if they play their match in one of the most popular football leagues.

Slavia Praha previous match

Slavia Praha fixtures tab is showing the last 100 football matches with statistics and win/draw/lose icons.

There are also all Slavia Praha scheduled matches that they are going to play in the future.

Slavia Praha performance and form graph is a Sofascore unique algorithm that we are generating from the team's last 10 matches, statistics, detailed analysis and our own knowledge.

This graph may help predict future Slavia Praha matches.

Current Slavia Praha players

Forward: Ivan Schranz, Tomáš Chorý, Mojmír Chytil, Václav Jurečka, Daniel Fila, Stanislav Tecl Midfielder: Oscar Dorley, Christos Zafeiris, Matěj Jurásek, Lukáš Provod, El Hadji Malick Diouf, David Doudera, Lukáš Vorlický, Conrad Wallem, Petr Ševčík, Alexandr Bužek, Dominik Pech Defender: Igoh Ogbu, David Zima, Tomáš Holeš, Andres Dumitrescu, Tomáš Vlček, Lukáš Masopust, Jan Bořil, Stepan Chaloupek, Ondřej Zmrzlý, Filip Prebsl Goalkeeper: Jindřich Staněk, Ondřej Kolář, Antonin Kinsky, Aleš Mandous, Filip Slavata

The current Slavia Praha roster, stats and player performance can be found on this page.

There are also statistics for each player in all competitions with all total played and started matches, minutes played, number of goals scored, number of cards and much more.

Slavia Praha top scorers list is updated live during every match.

You can click on players from the roster above and see available personal information such as nationality, date of birth, height, preferred foot, position, player value, transfer history etc.
